title: Retry build and deployment (no functional changes)

requirements.summary: Trigger a fresh build/deployment run using the current repository state with no functional/source changes.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build is started using the current repository state.
No source files are modified as part of this request.
Deployment is attempted again and reports success or a clear failure reason.

file_operations.description: Create a no-op rebuild trigger marker file intended solely to re-run the build/deployment pipeline (contains no application source/logic and does not change runtime behavior).
